授業目的:
1. To get an overview of Japan's history until 1640.
2. To learn how to work with sources.
3. To polish the academic skills of the participants.
到達目標:
1. Participants has a grasp of Japan's history until 1640. They can identify important events and persons, and explain the historical contexts, as well as discuss how the importance of those particular details is argued.
2. Participants can analyze a source [in translation] and contextualize it in the framework of history studied in class.
3. Participants can produce an academic discussion of an academic article on a subject related to the course topic.
特記事項:
本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
【合併】総合日本学習科目（歴史Ａ）（CIEC）/Japanese History A（国際学部）
授業方法: Lectures based on discussions of the textbook, analyses of source materials and selected academic articles.  Taking turns students will be responsible for starting off the discussion of the textbook.  Online tests will keep you on track of your studies.  Regularly, but not in every class, participants must submit answers, questions and comments related to material discussed in class.
